name: Maze Adventure
description:
Here it is are you ready to go on an adventure mr.square has to save the glitchy video game world. Are you up for a challenge?

updates

- Level 1 updated

Information how to play

I cant go to level 2 = click on level 2 the text

Some places are glitchy when i die for no reason = Use your strategy to get to the epic face and memorize where the glitchy stuff are

I will never make it to the epic face = Try going out of the screen and doing it

Made with click team fusion 2.5 standard
